body_html:
@petewarden @gunan Should we install PIL as part of our CI infrastructure and add this as a dependency?

Part of me thinks that, serving as an example, this is not going to do everything that people want to do, so perhaps we leave a comment instead suggesting other ways to read images instead.

body:
@petewarden @gunan Should we install PIL as part of our CI infrastructure and add this as a dependency?

Part of me thinks that, serving as an example, this is not going to do everything that people want to do, so perhaps we leave a comment instead suggesting other ways to read images instead.
